repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary:
This manuscript has at least two texts. The first text is of Nānārtharatnamālā. First 33 folio are lost. According to the manuscript colophon the author of the text is Bhāskaravibudha. This text is ascribed to Irugapa Daṇḍādhinātha. The published edition accept Irugapa Daṇḍādhinātha as the author of the text.
The second text title seems to be mentioned in the left margin of the folio (mālikā-1v). But the folio is broken so the title is unclear. The title mentioned in the left margin is dyāna (2 letters broken) mālikā. Before the beginning of the second text a bank folio with a line written in Telugu script is found. At the end of the manuscript a folio with two lines (x1v 1) mādidisi vai viṣṇo stuti yā bata ? kuśnedyāṃ anteḥ svābhā (x1v 2) svadheśaṃ mukuṭādibṛṣaṃ Below this scribbled avya iti jagadīśyādi… Blank folio has śāsanaṃ niṣkaragrā?ma (line 2) śara? ṇaṇīyam Blank folio at the end thaiva mantrikā dṛṣṭvā ri? likhitā tathā asaṃbadhā vā susaṃbaddhā vā na doṣo likhita?m Last folio has matter. It seems to be listing but it is not clear and characters are incised and are without ink.

msItem.title: Nānārtharatnamālā
msItem.author: Bhāskaravibudha (Irugapa Daṇḍādhinātha)
msItem.incipit: (Nānārtha-34r 1) śri ?venāya śrīpataye namaḥ smarāmyahaṃ vi?nāśakṛte (lacuna due to broken folio) (Nānārtha-34r 2) yi budhānahasyā? prabṛtikā vedānāmapi murdhano
msItem.explicit: (Nānārtha-102v 6) bata samantatassarvato ‘tha śobhanāṃ na sukhantayo tva iti ca tvarakṣaram iti
msItem.colophon: (Nānārtha-102v 8) (erased two letters and then overlapped letters) (āṃyā naḥ added in the margin.) [ha]riḥ oṃ śubhamastu. śrīyai namaḥ maṃgalāni bhavantu.

msItem.title: Dhyāna(lacuna 2 letters) mālikā
msItem.rubric: (mālikā 1v 1)śṛtismṛtinadipurṇaṃ śastrakalevāvasaṃkulaṃ viṣṇuṅaktyuda (mālikā 1v 2) kaṃ śudhaṃ vande vi[ghnaśa?] rṇavaṃ
msItem.explicit: (mālikā xv 1) janana dinajanamandāradivijanananana jīnadaityarājabhujabalarāyyavara (mālikā xv 2) janana śveyādini yeśrīveṃkateśajanana (rest orf the folio is blank.)

extent.measure: 2 guard folio, 79 written folio, 2 blank folio.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil numerals in the left margin. first 33 folio are lost. 34-102 folio are numbered. Folio of the second text are not numbered. Secod text dhyāna..mālikā is not numbered properly. But it is clear that the numbering is not continues. The last folio of the manuscriopt are not in order and seems to be some unrelated folio are mixed with the manuscript so the last folio of the dhyāna..mālikā is counted as x.
supportDesc.condition: many folio with worm holes and broken margins.

handNote.desc: Letters are sometimes sperad. character shape is unclear specially in the clusters.

additions.desc: Numer 69 wirtten in pink pencil on the front guard folio.
hariḥ oṃ is written in the left margin of the t1-34r.
hariḥ oṃ is written in the left margin of the mālikā-1v.
dhyāna (2 letters broken) mālikā is written in the left margin of the mālikā-1v.

binding.p: white thread is used to tie the manuscript,

listBibl.bibl: Nānārtha-ratnamālā of Irugapa Daṇḍādhinātha critically edited by Bellikoth Ramachandra Sharma. Poona : Deccan College Post-Graduate and Research Institute, 1954

encodingDesc.p: A last folio of the manuscript is counted as x and the other folio after a blank folio is counted as x1. Square bracket is used to show supllied words or folio numbers. spaces are added to separate words.

TEI.text:
(Nānārtha-34r 1) śri ?venāya śrīpataye namaḥ smarāmyahaṃ vi?nāśakṛte (lacuna due to broken folio) (Nānārtha-34r 2) yi budhānahasyā? prabṛtikā vedānāmapi murdhano
(Nānārtha-102v 6) bata samantatassarvato ‘tha śobhanāṃ na sukhantayo tva iti ca tvarakṣaram iti (Nānārtha-102v 7)jagadupakāriṇyāṃ bāskaravibudhena saṃgṛhitāyāṃ nānārtharatnamālāyāmavyayakā (Nānārtha-102v 8)ṇḍa (erased two letters and then overlapped letters) (āṃyā naḥ added in the margin.) [ha]riḥ oṃ śubhamastu. śrīyai namaḥ maṃgalāni bhavantu.

(mālikā 1v 1)śṛtismṛtinadipurṇaṃ śastrakalevāvasaṃkulaṃ viṣṇuṅaktyuda (mālikā 1v 2) kaṃ śudhaṃ vande vi[ghnaśa?] rṇavaṃ śrīmadvighnasaṃvandenasya śi (mālikā 1v 3) ṣyātmahātmanaḥkāśyapātrimaricyākhyānmunimukhyānnamāmya (mālikā 1v 4) haṃ
(mālikā xv 1) janana dinajanamandāradivijanananana jīnadaityarājabhujabalarāyyavara (mālikā xv 2) janana śveyādini yeśrīveṃkateśajanana (rest orf the folio is blank.)
